channel.title: API Management with Kong Konnect :: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Introduction Kong Konnect is an API lifecycle management platform delivered as a service. The management plane is hosted in the cloud by Kong, while the runtime environments are deployed in your AWS accounts. Management plane enables customers to securely execute API management activities such as create API routes, define services etc. Runtime environments connect with the management plane using mutual transport layer authentication (mTLS), receive the updates and take customer facing API traffic.
